Articles.Content:
Yeah, apparently DA is not available. AFAIK, though.

So who resorted to gas attack first? When did the nation declare war? How long did it last? Who declared war? Is there a peace offer by any nation? Are there communications between warring states?

1.) He gassed me first and I returned the favor.

2.) The war began on December 31, 2013.

3.) It lasted until earlier today (January 3, 2014)

4.) The Arab Union declared war on me for no reason (other than probably to steal my land and money, and possibly because he was bored, IDK).

5.) I offered peace several times, but he refused. I even offered to pay him for peace but he didn't respond to my communiques.

6.) I sent many communiques but didn't respond to any of them. He only sent one communique to tell me that if I continued resistance (whatever that's supposed to mean) his chemical weapons might rain down on my people. I also got a few comms from DA right after the start of the war. In a few minutes I will post some screenshots in an edit.

Edit:

Here are the communiques I received:

Edited January 4, 2014 by nettcod

"If you continue resistance my chems may rain down on your people." --- The Arab Union

This simple comment tells me the AU is resorting to chemical weapon first because he hated resistance. Hmmm...

"If you continue resistance my chems may rain down on your people." --- The Arab Union

This simple comment tells me the AU is resorting to chemical weapon first because he hated resistance. Hmmm...

Bombing the chem storage would be effective.
Is it normal that I have 700 GDP but 30,600 km2 of territory?

Is it normal that I have 700 GDP but 30,600 km2 of territory?

It's normal. GDP increases over time, while you have to capture territories.

Sadly theres a thing called limits. Can't attack a country that is more than 200% your GDP or 75% of it.
